text:
TubeScience | Full-Stack Engineer | Full-Time | ONSITE | Los Angeles, CA

TubeScience is a data-driven advertising company that represent a large and growing percentage of Facebook video ads that's looking for a software engineer to help design and build a job management system which will be a complete software solution for managing video production, distribution, and analytics. We are looking to bring this product to market alongside our advertising services, and our ideal candidate is someone that can bring strong software architecture experience to create a solid foundation on which to build on. Located in DTLA, we're a fast-growing bootstrapped startup that provides video production, targeting, and ad analytics to clients that we feel have something positive to offer to the world. If you're interested, you can apply now at:

https://grnh.se/99ece0862
